content: I'm wondering what the right way is to make progress on #93244, #93244, and #93368... should we do an FCP/MCP about the whole approach? Or is it sufficient to just have some discussion here? It would be nice if the PRs could be discussed and then merged before they start to bitrot, as they are large and a bit tedious...
I always thought this was the design we wanted to get towards xD I have read all the PRs as they were opened and yes, we should move them along before they rot
